data.description: Provides a framework for evaluating marketing problems and developing a marketing strategy. Customer, competitor, and collaborator factors are emphasized as foundations for marketing decision-making. Examines the key aspects of product, pricing, distribution, and promotion strategy.
data.title: MARKETING MANAGEMENT

data.description: Study of the impact of analytics on successful marketing decisions. A spectrum of topics include Marketing Metrics, Digital Analytics, Marketing Response Models, Segmentation, Product Design, Experimentation and Big Data. Applicable to careers in marketing analytics, product management and consulting.
data.title: MARKETING ANALYTICS
